mmwave.dataloader.utils¶

mmwave.dataloader.utils.parse_tsw1400(path, num_chirps_per_frame, num_frames, num_rx_ant, num_adc_samples, iq=True, num_adc_bits=16)¶

Parse the raw ADC data based on IWR1642 and TSW1400 configuration.

Parse the row-majored binary output from raw ADC data capture to numpy array with the shape of (numFrame, num_chirps_per_frame, num_rxs, num_adc_samples)

Parameters:
  • path (str) – File path of the binary data.
  • num_chirps_per_frame – Total number of chirps from all transmitters in a single frame.
  • num_frames – Number of frames in the recorded binary data.
  • num_rx_ant – Number of physical receivers.
  • num_adc_samples – Number of ADC samples.
  • iq – True if complex and False if real.
  • num_adc_bits – Number of ADC quantization bits.
Returns:

Parsed ADC data with the shape of (num_frames, num_chirps_per_frame, num_rxs, num_adc_samples)
Return type:

adc (ndarray)

mmwave
